# This is project 1

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Example data
x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [10, 8, 6, 4, 2]

# Create scatter plot
plt.scatter(x, y)
plt.title("My Scatter Plot")
plt.xlabel("X values")
plt.ylabel("Y values")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
